## Marketplace images management commands

Marketplace images management commands.


### Get a specific marketplace image

Get a specific marketplace image.

**Usage:**

```
scw marketplace image get [arg=value ...]
```


**Args:**

| Name |   | Description |
|------|---|-------------|
| label | Required |  |



### List marketplace images

List marketplace images.

**Usage:**

```
scw marketplace image list
```
